name: Rep Air
description:
[Sorry, you'll probably have to zoom out to see the full game]

In REP AIR, the new state-of-the-art in air selling simulators, you take on the role of a 5 year old air rep! Look at all the features we managed to cram into this game in the last 48 hours: 

  • Child labor! 
  • Selling air from your parent's house! 
  • Harvesting air from 7 different locations! 
  • Mars!
  • Time travel!
  • Mysterious hooded features!
  • Incredible narrative depth!
  • Tragedy!

Part of Noisebridge GGJ2020

Credits:

johnfn - Witty news ticker text, programming

daidiimon - Murdering innocent children, inspiring commit messages, programming 

fawnblue - Baby drawing

stardew - Music
